en: Font size value for menus/dialogs/etc.\nFont width and height will be set automatically.
Font size for game world (when not using tiles).\nFont width and height will be set automatically.
Font size for world map view a.k.a overmap.\nFont width and height will be set automatically.
Click to save these settings to options.json.\nThey are also saved automatically when setting a font.
Use selected font for game world\n(when not using tiles).
Use selected font for world map view a.k.a overmap.
Can't manage fonts at this time: font config file does not exist. Make sure you've started the game at least once to create it.
